Name: White Cosmo
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Just what it says on the tin.
History: Emerged during 2002 in New York City. For more recipes, origins and history behind the Cosmopolitan cocktail, see our Cosmopolitan page .
Nutrition: One serving of White Cosmo contains 159 calories
